content: DX 76 Powder-actuated tool Semi-automatic, high-productivity, powder-actuated nailer for fastening metal decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Outstanding ergonomic design – padded, non-slip cycling grip and excellent balance means less fatigue during use Built-in safety mechanisms – for safer and more reliable operation Easy to clean and maintain on jobsites Ruggedly built to withstand extreme use Adjustable power regulator – precise control for more reliable fastenings Applications Fastening composite metal decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for composite decking Fastening metal roof decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for roofing Fastening liner trays to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for siding Fastening grating elements to steel structures using grating accessories Fastening shear connectors on steel structures with HVB accessories ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 17.7 x 4 x 13.9 in Weight: 9.6 lb. Fastener length range: 0.75 - 0.83 in Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 17.7 x 4 x 13.9 in | Weight | 9.6 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.75 - 0.83 in | Cartridge type | 6.8/18 M10 | Automatic piston return | No | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | No | Power (max.) | 609 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-76-P-ENP ### ITEMS- 3954804 - DX 76 MX & Single Pin Baseplates - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX76 Basic unit - 1x X-76-P-ENP Piston - 1x Nail magazine MX 76 assy - 1x POWDER ACTUATED TOOL CLEANING KIT - 1x DX 76 / DX 8 Tool case - 1x Fastener guide X-76-F-N15 - 285794 - Powder-actuated tool DX 76-MX - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX76 Basic unit - 1x X-76-P-ENP Piston - 1x Nail magazine MX 76 assy - 1x POWDER ACTUATED TOOL CLEANING KIT - 1x DX 76 / DX 8 Tool case - 3497153 - Kit X-ENP19 MXR + 6.8/18 M B - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Sheet metal nail X-ENP-19 L15 MXR - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/18 M .27 cal blue - 3510001 - Kit X-ENP 19 MXR + 6.8/18 M C-T B - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Sheet metal nail X-ENP-19 L15 MXR - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/18 M10 .27 cal C-T blue - 3510002 - Kit X-ENP 19 MXR + 6.8/18 M C-T R - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Sheet metal nail X-ENP-19 L15 MXR - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/18 M10 .27 cal C-T red
